text.div:
NehtaPeritoneumInvasion

Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recorded.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-crc-peritoneum-invasion

name: NehtaPeritoneumInvasion
description: Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recorded.

contains.display: Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface
Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface
